metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0220 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the meta plugin (Plugin/meta.pm) in ikiwiki before 3.20120516 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) author or (2) authorurl meta tags.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0220` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20120516ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20120516ubuntu1').
